Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycapservers.game.Lobby

  • public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one instance of a lobby.
    Author:
    ted

      • addPlayer

        public boolean addPlayer(java.lang.String p,
                         org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession s)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Adds a player to the lobby. Also checks to see if the game is full and if so sends a message to start the game.
        Parameters:
        p - The user id of the person joining the game.
        s - The websocketsession of the person joing the game.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game has started.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
